timeline.message:
Remove references

As can be seen, this blows up the corresponding issues with unrelated references:

* https://github.com/junit-pioneer/junit-pioneer/issues/265
* https://github.com/junit-pioneer/junit-pioneer/issues/164

Include commit message template in PR template

I always find myself looking for this part in `CONTRIBUTING.md`, so I thought this is a helpful addition.
Add max characters hint to commit message template

timeline.bodyText: Did you don't write the # by purpose (like #357) or is it related to the contributing?
timeline.author: Bukama

replies.bodyText:
I basically just copied the template from here:
https://github.com/junit-pioneer/junit-pioneer/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit-message
What do you have in mind exactly? Precede e.g. ${issues} with #?
replies.author: beatngu13

replies.bodyText: Yes that is what I was thinking of. But if we have this in the CONTRIBUTING this way I don't know if I just feel to bad about people.
replies.author: Bukama
